column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Came for their famous deep dish pizza. 45 min wait to cook the pizza
column2: so we ordered an appetizer and beer first. Loved the calamari
column3: crispy and fresh. Ordered Small Lou add pepperoni and hot giardiniera
column4: which was awesome. Extremely filling; a small was enough for the 2 of us.
